taxon_identification.name_authority_date: Setaria pumila (Poir.) Roem. & Schult. subsp. pumila

bio:treatment.description: Blades yellowish-green. Bristles yellowish. Spikelets 3-3.4 mm. 2n = 36, 72.
bio:treatment.discussion: Setaria pumila subsp. pumila is a European adventive that has become a common weed in lawns and cultivated fields throughout temperate North America.
